meanings.definition: A person who holds a position of authority or leadership.
meanings.sent1: The topkicks in the school help make important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The topkicks in the company lead the team effectively.
meanings.sent3: The topkicks decided to have a silly hat day at work.
meanings.sent4: She was the topkicks of the dance floor, leading with grace and confidence.
meanings.sent5: The topkicks of the group always stands out with their strong presence.

meanings.definition: The highest-ranking officer in a military unit.
meanings.sent1: The topkicks in the army led the troops into battle.
meanings.sent2: The topkicks received a medal for their bravery in combat.
meanings.sent3: The topkicks joked that they were the king of the battlefield.
meanings.sent4: He was the topkicks of the squadron, guiding them with precision.
meanings.sent5: The topkicks commanded respect with their strategic decisions.

meanings.definition: A type of shoe with a thick sole and often a high heel.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite topkicks to the party.
meanings.sent2: The topkicks were comfortable for a long day of walking.
meanings.sent3: His topkicks got stuck in the mud during the hike.
meanings.sent4: The topkicks clicked on the pavement as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The topkicks added a stylish touch to her outfit.
